rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with ample natural light, aligned to the east as per Vastu principles for positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious area for family gatherings with modern design elements and large openings to ensure ventilation and natural lighting. Placed in south-east direction to balance the home's energy.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, designed for family meals with a view of the garden.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional and modern kitchen layout placed in the southeast area, ensuring ventilation and ease of access. Designed with Vastu in mind by placing cooking appliances away from windows.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A private space for the family head, located on the west side as per Vastu guidelines to ensure restful sleep and privacy. Includes an attached bathroom.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: Spare bedroom designed for guests or a home office, with ample storage and windows for natural light. Placed in the northeast direction for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: A small living area combined with a kitchenette and a private bathroom for domestic help, located on the north-west corner for privacy while ensuring Vastu compliance.

rooms.name: Storage/Utility Room
rooms.description: Additional storage space integrated within the ground floor to manage household supplies. Placed in a less frequented area to reduce clutter.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: An entertainment space with built-in soundproofing and comfortable seating. Located in the southwest corner for minimal distraction, adhering to Vastu principles by balancing energy.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large entrance door ensuring ample light and ventilation.

openings.name: Front Window
openings.description: Large window for natural lighting in the living areas.

openings.name: Side Windows
openings.description: Windows to ensure cross ventilation, particularly around the kitchen and dining area.

openings.name: Skylight
openings.description: Provides additional daylighting and energy efficiency across rooms.
